tool_description: GeoIP HUB aggregates data from around 20 free GeoIP services and makes decision through voting.
name: geoip hub
title: geoip hub

api_list.name: Plain
api_list.description: Returns data in plain text format.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description:
IPv4 or IPv6 address.
Note that not every GeoIP service supports IPv6, so there will be fewer providers in the voting.

optional_parameters.name: field
optional_parameters.description:
Fields to return (country, country_code, etc.).
If no field parameter is added, it returns 'country' field.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description:
Timeout in seconds - limits requests to GeoIP APIs.
Helps to improve response time.

api_list.name: Json
api_list.description:
Returns data in JSON format.
Most powerful endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description:
IPv4 or IPv6 address.
Note that not every GeoIP service supports IPv6, so there will be fewer providers in the voting.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description:
Timeout in seconds - limits requests to GeoIP APIs.
Helps to improve response time.

optional_parameters.name: field
optional_parameters.description:
Fields to return (country, country_code, etc.).
You can use multiple field parameters: &field=country&field=country_code.
If no field parameter is added, it returns all available fields.
